title: Mastery score / Mastery level
body: Is it me? or the new update got some problems. My mastery score is 0 and my Mastery lvl 6 on jhin {{champion:202}} is zero. Most of the mastery is gone! can someone tell me the problem or solution to fix the problem.

replies.body: EU has been undergoing some maintenance, so this should just be a visual issue.  I double checked for you and confirmed your mastery for Jhin is still 6!  :D  Rest easy!
So what was the maintenance about? :)
It's not just you bud. Apparently it affected a couple of people. Adding myself.
